StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetInternalTrainingEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
--@PointOfContactID integer, --@En.tyTypeID integer AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT
--These columns may be needed by the data contracts for insert/update oe.[FiscalYear], e.[EventID], e.[EventType], e.[EventName],
--This will be foreign key from EventDate table -- There can be more than one event date [EventDateID],
-- TrainigType and Name are speci.c to Internal training as there can be -- more than one topic - thoughs as per the analyst most of the .me it will -- be one topic -- Topic - The type/name of the training being o.ered. (from SDD) ite.[TrainingType], ite.[TrainingName], ite.[InstructorName],
--The member(s) of the OST that will be required to atend the training session. (from SDD) -- at present a comma seperated list of atendees ite.[AtendeeList],
eco.[Cost],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) + ',' + RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) + '.' + IsNull(substring(pc.POCLegalMiddleName,1,1),'') + '.' AS POCName, [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName], [POCFirstName], [TelephoneNumber]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[InternalTrainingEvent] ite inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] oe ON ite.Organiza.onEventID = oe.Organiza.onEventID inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.EventID = oe.EventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = oe.PointOfContactID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCost] eco ON oe.EventCostID = oe.EventCostID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventDate] ed ON oe.EventDateID = oe.EventDateID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
